analysis.key_quote: I write to respectfully oppose the Office of Personnel Management’s (“OPM”) proposed amendments to 5 CFR Parts 210, 212, 213, 302, 432, and 752, which would establish a new “Schedule Policy/Career” classification, reclassify career employees into this schedule, and strip affected employees of critical civil service protections guaranteed under Title 5, including Chapters 75 and 43.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about the removal of civil service protections and due process rights, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization of the civil service.
